name: Prospect of Failure
description:
Prospect of Failure is about founding new space colonies and getting them ready for someone else to take over and administer.

This is the game exactly as it was at the end of TOJam 12. You can produce and move units and explore the map, but nothing more yet.

  • Right click on terrain to move the selected unit.
  • Left click on units and buildings to select them
  • Basic rovers and transports are fully solar powered and have no actions in the night time
